mdRecord.dcterms:description: This black and white photograph shows a group of two men and a woman standing outdoors with what is probably the Rotunda at the University of Virginia in the distant background. The handwritten notes on the back read as follows, "Clarence M. Wood, Sr., Nannie E. Wood, Edward T. Wood, U.Va., Between 1952-1956."
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Edward T. Wood and Mr. and Mrs. C. M. Wood at UVA, 1950s (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Photographs
Wood, Nannie Elizabeth Walker
Wood, Clarence M. (Clarence Mosby), Sr.
University of Virginia
